targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${measurement}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "${DistinctFieldNameAnchor}")
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement"])
  |> count()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${measurement}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "${DistinctFieldNameAnchor}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["level"] == "INF" or r["level"] == "INFO")
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement", "level"])
  |> count()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${measurement}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "${DistinctFieldNameAnchor}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["level"] == "WRN" or r["level"] == "WARN")
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement", "level"])
  |> count()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${measurement}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "${DistinctFieldNameAnchor}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["level"] == "ERROR" or r["level"] == "ERR")
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement", "level"])
  |> count()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${measurement}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "${DistinctFieldNameAnchor}")
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement", "action", "_field"])
  |> count()
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: true)

panels.title: P3 SMS API request count (By Action)

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${measurement}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "${DistinctFieldNameAnchor}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["action"] =~ /.*${action}/)
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement", "action"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${aggre_window}s, fn: count, createEmpty: true)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${measurement}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "${DistinctFieldNameAnchor}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["accode"] != "")
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement", "accode"])
  |> count()
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: true)

panels.title: Counter requests (by Accode), Accept value: `Greater than or equal to`

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${measurement}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "${DistinctFieldNameAnchor}")
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement"])
  |> count()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${measurement}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "${DistinctFieldNameAnchor}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["status_code"] == "200")
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement", "status_code"])
  |> count()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${measurement}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "${DistinctFieldNameAnchor}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["status_code"] == "404")
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement", "status_code"])
  |> count()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${measurement}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "${DistinctFieldNameAnchor}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["status_code"] == "503")
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement", "status_code"])
  |> count()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${measurement}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "${DistinctFieldNameAnchor}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["status_code"] =~ /.*${status_code}/)
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement", "_field", "status_code", "action"])
  |> count()
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: true)

panels.title: P3 SMS API request count (By status code & action)

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${measurement}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "${DistinctFieldNameAnchor}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["status_code"] =~ /.*${status_code}/)
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement", "action", "status_code"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${aggre_window}s, fn: count, createEmpty: true)

panels.title: Action Requests Count by `status_code`, aggregation window: ${aggre_window}s

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${measurement}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "${DistinctFieldNameAnchor}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["accode"] == "${Accode}")
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement", "accode"])
  |> count()
  |> yield(name: "count")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${measurement}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "${DistinctFieldNameAnchor}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["accode"] == "${Accode}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["level"] == "INF" or r["level"] == "INFO")
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement", "accode"])
  |> count()
  |> yield(name: "count")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${measurement}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "${DistinctFieldNameAnchor}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["accode"] == "${Accode}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["level"] == "WARN" or r["level"] == "WRN")
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement", "accode"])
  |> count()
  |> yield(name: "count")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${measurement}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["accode"] == "${Accode}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "${DistinctFieldNameAnchor}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["level"] == "ERROR" or r["level"] == "ERR")
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement", "accode"])
  |> count()
  |> yield(name: "count")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${measurement}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "${DistinctFieldNameAnchor}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["accode"] == "${Accode}")
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement", "accode", "action"])
  |> count()
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: true)

panels.title: API request count group by action, Accode: ${Accode}

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${measurement}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "duration_ms")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["accode"] == "${Accode}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["action"] =~ /.*${action}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(
    every: ${aggre_window}s,
    fn: (column, tables=<-) => tables |> count(),
    createEmpty: true
  )

panels.title: API request count group by action, Accode: ${Accode}, aggregation window: ${aggre_window}s

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${measurement}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "duration_ms")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["accode"] == "${Accode}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["action"] =~ /.*${action}/)
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement", "_field", "accode", "action"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${aggre_window}s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

panels.title: Avg. response time, Accode: ${Accode}, aggregation window: ${aggre_window}s

from(bucket: "${bucket}")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["accode"] == "${Accode}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["action"] =~ /.*${action}/)
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement", "_field", "accode", "action"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${aggre_window}s, fn: min, createEmpty: false)
